name: ecc-style-core
description: Contains core styles, icons and fonts for all materialized components.

scripts.prepublish: mkdir -p dist/fonts/materialicons && cp -fru node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/* dist/fonts/materialicons && mkdir -p dist/fonts/roboto && cp -fru node_modules/roboto/fonts/* dist/fonts/roboto && gulp

author: Michael Haschke <michael.haschke@eccenca.com>
